content.detailedDescription: I was traveling back to taos at around 1140am mt, going north on nm 68 afterhaving been in santa fe to get my cell phone serviced.   it was raining on andoff and there were large patches of storm clouds intermixed with clearings andbreaks in the clouds.  sometimes everything was soft and greyish and sometimesparts of the landscape and sky were in full light.Somewhere between espanola and velarde, nm and just south of the los lucerosexit, i noticed a very steady solid white shape moving swiftly and smoothly in asouthern direction parallel to the highway in the opposite direction of mytravel.  its altitude and speed at this time did not fluctuate.  it made its wayfrom my northwest at roughly 20 degrees to slighty south of my due westperpendicular to the highway in a fairly short period of time.  if i had toguess id say it covered between 12 and 1 mile in no more than 20 seconds.  itraded between watching the object and watching the road, trying to determine ashape and wether it would be worth stopping the car.   i was looking for thetell-tale signs of a small engine plane or large bird and could distinguish nofeatures, other than an ellipse seen at a subtle angle.    then it sloweddramatically, almost to a stop, and started dropping in altitude,  it was atthis time that my curiosity was high enough to stop the car.  this is only thesecond time i have ever done something like this.  the first time i was able toquickly determine that what i was seeing was a large shaped balloon on a tether. this sighting lasted almost an hour with no satisfying explaination.I crossed the 4-lane highway 2 lanes in each direction separated by a landdivider somewhat excitedly because its shape was still elusive, and now itsmovement quickly ruled out a lot of possibilities. it was about 1145am when istarted watching it.It stayed in the same general area for a very very long time, changing altitudein a range as high as 20 degrees no higher than the high mountain line in thisarea and as low as possibly landing.  in fact, i never saw it leave.   i leftonly when i became convinced that it was not going to come close enough to me toget a good photo.During the 55 minutes i observed it, it exhibited the following behaviors firstit behaved like a bee hovering over flowers, except with less erratic motion anda bit slower.  it would dip down low enough
content.summary: Daylight disk sighting in northern nm

content.detailedDescription: Mufonive spent 30 years in the company of a communicating extraterrestrial source,with an extensive agenda to accomplish.  i am preparing a website, now atetcode.Com e.T. code, which explains that agenda, and is already showing aquantity of unrefutable trace evidence there, to prove it is the real article. if you really want to know what the ufo visits are all about, you can start toread about it at that website, or you can talk to me. quite frankly, you areotherwise looking in the wrong place, for any of the answers to the real issue,as to why there are ufo sightings. if, however, you just want to load your filewith another glimpse of a ufo report, then you neednt investigate the study ofthe e.T. code message of their government, to this earth, at that site.Ill state here for the record i had alerted mufon, in case later, the publiclooks for someone to blame, about why it wasnt alerted on such an importantmatter, as is being revealed at the etcode.Com website.Also, i would like to link to a source of information on the reported ufologicaldata on ufo capacity to change sizes, for instance, where a small craft appearedto be very much larger on inside. a ufo was reported to suck up a large pond ofwater, into a small craft, for instance, it was reported.Also data on ufo stealth is of some great significance - dissapearing fromradar, and occupants or craft as to suddenly vanish from sight.Also, the prevelance of occupant mental telepathy.  these fields all have somebearing on understanding the role of the extraterrestrial government, with earthhumanity, at this time.At the etcode.Com, the foremost articles are linked from dedication of on homepage, and chapters 1  2 in facend. at world plaque linked from homepage, is anexposure of as yet unlabeled diagrams and images discovered in the shape ofearth geography, that will prove earth had been constructed by extraterrestrialgovernment.  it is a matter of such importance, that is why i know the publicwill be looking around for someone to blame, when it isnt investigated andreported on.Evan
content.summary: E.T. encounter of the 5th kind, a contactee, took

content.detailedDescription: It had snowed,sky was clear in west,saw jet contrails from normal patterns fromintl airport 40 milessw.2 starlike lights were playing in and around lonecloud,near horizon,yet on this side and lower than contrails.Daughter also sawblack disc as i watched the others,then we both saw a black disc.My wife didntsee the lights,saw blk discs.Just what is this stuff
content.summary: 2 lights,2 black discs.

content.detailedDescription: At approx. 300 pm cst today, 31st march,2004, i was driving north on 17th ave inthe east hill neighborhood of pensacola, fl. my son was in the passenger seatbeside me. all of a sudden he says,look mommy theres a rocket flying underneaththe moon. the moon was rising in the eastern sky, which was as clear and as blueas i have ever seen it. as i was driving, i didnt even look at first, justreplied,oh, its probably an airplane. my son was very excitied at this point. heinsisted it was a rocket not a plane so i looked out his passenger window. well,there it was just like some of the photos of ufos i have seen in the media overthe years. it was very high upfar away but indeed it was underneath the moon. itwas cylinder shaped bright white. the color of it being like the white beachsand in these parts when its wet and the sun is shining upon it. it appeared tobeing moving in the same direction as our car, north. because i was driving, itold my son to keep an eye on it. he said it was moving very fast-faster thanour car... before i could pull over and get another look at it,my son told me itwas gone. it dissappeared just like that.What ever it was, it was definitely notany type of aircraft i know of. my son asked if we had seen a flying saucer andi replied, yea, i guess we have
content.summary: My son sees a rocket in a clear blue afternoon sky
Brightly lit object at tree tops

content.detailedDescription: Was eating lunch when first observed then working.
content.summary: Please see wa. state 12281997

content.detailedDescription: I was stationed aboard the uss monrovia apa-31. upon returning from themediterranean enroute to norfolk, va. in may, 1968, the ship was detoured tosearch for wreckage of ssn scorpion near the azores.The event occured well after dark, water calm, when i and some of my shipmatesobserved a submerged object just astern of the ship, traveling at the samecourse and speed. the object was however in very close proximity to the ship andappeared to almost surface. i was immediately struck by the size and brightnessof the object, and my first reaction was that it was not a submarine.The object matched the course and speed of the ship through several course andspeed changes. radio communications and radar were disabled.I lost sight of the object as it suddenly seemed to descend vertically very fastand then disappear from view.It should be noted that upon the return of the monrovia to norfolk, va., theentire crew and 600 marines who were aboard were ordered to sign a secrecydocument.
content.summary: Sighting of a ufo by the uss monrovia in 1968

content.detailedDescription: At the time of sighting i was sitting in my backyard relaxing before i went tobed. i was watching the sky as is my wont. i first noticed that the stars in thenight sky were blacked out and then reappeared. a u.F.Oto get a better . i wasstunned to actually see one. i jumped out of my chair to get a better look.Theobject was a perfect triangle. it was blacker than the night sky and displayed adim red light on each point of the triangle total viewing time was about 2-3seconds.The object was heading due east altitude unknown speed unknown and madeno sound at all. i lost sight of the object behind a tall spruce tree on theadjacent property
content.summary: Black triangle

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home safeway about 200 hundred yards down the street. at about 130in the morning hour i observed two extremely large burning globes to the westhovering or perhaps rising slowly. i was struck with utter amazement, seeingthat i had no idea what the objects could be. i continued to keep my eyes on theobjects as i made my way back to my apartment. they all of a sudden vanished andat that point i chalked the gigantic burning globes up to street lights in thedistance, i figured i must have picked up a light in the distance. i returnedhome and went to sleep. the next day i learned that many people witnessed theseufos and that they were reported on the radio and that the military wasdispatched. this was a statewide sighting and the objects landed near sheepcreek road outside of fairbanks alaska. please report any information regardingthese sightings, seeing that hundreds of people saw them and that it circulatedthrough out the state on the radio.
content.summary: Sheep creek alaska

content.detailedDescription: I was alone at a natural area about 50 km from sherwood parkit is an area in which i frequent often for campfires, boating, and hikes.  assoon as the sun was about 50 per cent set i was standing outside of my car inthe parking lot when out of the south came a soundless amber glowing orb thatcame to the edge of the parking lot.My jaw dropped open with astonishment and i just stood there too stupified to doanything.  for about 30 seconds to a minute, the object came to a stop at theedge of the parking lot and hovered there.  i felt like i was being watched.I grew afraid and started to think about getting into my car to try to escapewhen the orb started moving againnot towards me but perpendicular at a 90 degree angle.  it flew along the edgeof the lot and turned into the trees just out of site all the while not making asound.  all the wildlife was completely silent all this time.By now the shock had worn off enough for me to get into my car and go home.  ireturned the next night with a very close friend at about the same time and asif right on cue about ten minutes after we arrived, another craft made the sameflight path and dissapeared into the trees.   now my friend had seen it but didnot want to talk about ithe dismissed it as them probably wanting nothing to do with us primitives and weproceeded to have a campfire. easy to be brave when your not alone.That is one event that happened in this area that i wanted to pass on to you.  ihave seen a different type of craft in the same area holding rock solid in theair in 70 kmhr winds while cesnas were wiggling around like paper planes.   infact i have even seen a third type of craft in the area too.  these last twocraft i have mentioned could be reported with more detail upon request.  eversince i have seen these things i have been obsessed with them.  either i need tojoin the military to be able to fly these cool new craft theyre designing andkeeping secret.   either way it is not illegal in canada to have contact with aufo so there ive said it.Please excuse my poor writing form as i am very excited to maybe hear more onthis and maybe even get more involved with your organization.Ps i have also played guitar one night out there to a little blue orb the sizeof an aspirin at arms length that dissapeared when i got nervous that i had togo to the bathroom but came back when i was done.
content.summary: Silent floating amber orb

content.detailedDescription: It was around 430am. i had been awake for quite a while. i was getting hungry soi went upstairs to cook some lasagna in the microwave. during the 6 minutes ittook to cook, i looked outside my balcony window as i often do, in hopes of aufo sighting. it was a clear nightmorning, many stars were visible and therewasnt a cloud in sight. frustrated with never seeing any objects, i mentallyexpressed something to the nature of if any aliens exist, please show yourselvesnow and i will be very grateful. lo and behold this circular object veryreminiscent of a star in shape and size, flying much much higher than any planei had ever seen, begun to slowly dance across the sky. it was glowingwhiteish-yellow, brighter than a star and begun flying in 4 or 5 s formationsfor about 30-45 seconds before it disappeared out of the range of my windowview.During the encounter i was very calm and remained skeptical. however, i wasalmost instantly convinced by the ufos movements that it could not be a plane ora satelitte.This was my first encounter. rather uneventful but ill take what i can get.
content.summary: High altitude circular object floating across sky

content.detailedDescription: I had recently purchased a canon es8600 video camcorder and have been interestedin space  ufos since i had seen one at the age of 12-13 years old.I had seen a science series several years ago on tv that said how to video tapeobjects in the sky, so i tried it after purchasing the camcorder in february2004.On the night of march 19,2004, noticing an object in the sky that did not looklike a star i started video taping. the object has a red  white pulsatingcharacteristic that the other stars did not have.This object shows up around 900 pm every night since the 17th of march at about15-20 degrees from the horizon. it is twinkling like a star but red can be seenwith the ordinary eye. in zooming in on the objectit is round, has in its center a round black spotbut has strips of blackness that seems to to come from right top across thecentermiddle to the left botton. then this blackness can be seen which lookslike it comes from behind on its surface from the top, rolls down the middle tothe bottom. then this blackness comes from the left side of this object, rollsacross the front, middle and bottom right. this blackness, which looks like ashadow, starts or comes from the right side then rolls around the right sideedge, around the surfaces edge and ends up on the left side of the object andlooks as if it goes behind it you can see blackness from the left top in theshape of an y that rolls from the left top, down the middle, then bares to theleft and bottom of the object.A jet was going by and can be heard on the tape. i tried to capture the jet inthe viewfinder on the camcorderbut didnt want to let this object out of the viewfinder, so i did not capturethe jetbut the object then emitted what looked like a large cloud which covered most ofits surface
content.summary: Video taped unidentified object

content.detailedDescription: Late 1970s or early 1980, as far as i can remember, it was just after dusk, icant remember if it was summer or not but it was warm out as we were playingfootball at out friends and we were in tee-shirts.  we two of uswere on our wayhome from playing.  we first noticed a very large, perfectly triangular objectin the air, only about 300 to 400 feet up, moving from the south to the northwithout a sound.  several other witnesses near us saw the craft and it wasreported in the warren ohio tribune newspaper the next day.  it was so close wethought we would get zapped up into the craft.  i told my parents and of coursethey did not believe me, until the paper reported it the next day.  each pointof the triangle had a white lightsteady, not flashing.  propulsion was completely silent.  i noticed a definitestructure on the belly of the craft, similar to the structural members on theoutside skin of the john hancock building in chicago only much more complex, andit looked heavy, like it shouldnt be in the air.  it wasnt moving fast enough toaquire lift so the propulsion is still a mystery to me.  scared the hell out ofme and i will never forget what i saw.
content.summary: Slow-moving triangular craft

content.detailedDescription: Sunday march 22 2004 was the datei was driving home from work which was across town from where i live. it wasnice outside and i was looking out over the military base when i first noticedthe object.  i was interested in it because it looked so big and i assumed itwas some military craft.  there were no planes that i am aware of that would beas big as the object so i kept my attention on the object as i drove. casuallylooking at the object to try to pick out any features, i continued on my wayhome. the drive home is about 13 miles so the drive was about 20 minutes ormore.  as i changed my perspective on the object as i drove past the airforcebase i began to realize that the object wasnt near the base anymore. the natureof the lights i saw told my logical self that it must have been an illusion andit was simply a tower. as i kept driving i realized that the object was muchfurther than i has previously assumed. since i was driving around 45 miles anhour i thought that it was only appearing to move. so i didnt think it was acraft for most of the drive. well then i began to realize that the object mightbe moving, if only very slowly.  maybe a blimp i kept my eyes on the object asmuch as i could while i was driving and tried to drive toward the object.  notgoing out of my way i ended up at home as planned.  i had to show my girlfriendthe object so i got her to get out of the house and walk out to the main road tosee the u.F.O herself.  i am a fan of sci-fi so i wanted a more criticalopinion.  she saw it and it was still where it was when i turned off the roadmaybe 5 minutes before. i watched the object for maybe 5 minutes with her and wediscussed what it possibly could be. she said that it was just tower lights fromthe mountain. i said it was a blimp. she said it couldnt be a blimp because itwasnt moving.  i told her it couldnt be a tower because from our perspective thelights were too large and the mountain wasnt that high.  we finally agreed thatit definitely was unusual and we couldnt figure out what it was. jokingly wesaid it was a u.F.O. with the usual connotations and both went back home. thenext night i realized that the mysterious lights were not anywhere in the sky.Leading me to report the sighting.There was no viewable body or shape or any physical or audible features.  theonly shape was the red lights.  there were two rows of lights which lookedcylindrical in shape. the bottom row was slightly wider than the top row and hadno flashing. there were seven to nine lights in a curved line which wereslightly dimmer than the upper row o
content.summary: I thought it was a blimp...

content.detailedDescription: the above wufod data field was completed for use during a mufon of georgiatraining class to be conducted on 27march04.  the above described information isnot real, but is intended for use as a sample document in the training ofmufonga field investigators and trainees.
content.summary: Humanoid entity-under low misty cloud-like formati

content.detailedDescription: At approximate 8:25 pm central, 3-20-2004. i had just returned from the movies and i paused just outside my front door in se alabama for a minute or two to admire the clear starry night sky. i first noticed the ufo when it was directly overhead - it was a formation of about 16-20 lights, forming a slightly irregular outline of a chevron or boomerang, about twice as wide as a full moon, travelling north i think. it disappeared over the horizon in only about 5 seconds. i thought at first maybe it was a very low-flying ultralight, except it was travelling way too fast and it was completely silent, and i got the impression that it was at a very high altitude.
content.summary: Saw a chevron formation of about 16-20 lights in s
flying face in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I am submitting this report in the hope of finding the original report that wastaken by shirley fickett, from my brother wayne meserve in 1975 to 1977
content.summary: 4 brite objects

content.detailedDescription: Mid jan. i was driving home after work around1145 pm on grange rd in nsmithfield, ri when i saw a giant glowing rough edged ball almost hovering inthe distance to my left, i watched while i drove. about a half mile down the rdi could still see it through the trees, ehen i got to the football field at thehigh school i noticed it getting closer i stopped and got out and watched goover very slowly. i almost freaked out. i almost reported to police. ilost theobject in the trees. about 3 weeks later i had forgotten about it, but aroundthe same time on a sunday i was bringing my girlfriend home and i saw it again.We both got out of the car and watched it. i saw your ad on public access theother day. so i figured i should tell someone.
content.summary: Large firey object in sky

content.detailedDescription: on thursday, march 18th, i was working as a security guard at the vail    valley medical center, and was out in the parking lot around noon on a    perfectly clear day when i saw an air force c-17 transport flying low and    slow over vail, coming from due east and turning to the south, flying over    vail mountain. later a friend and co-worker, jason, was in the parking lot    and mentioned having seen the transport down valley. as we talked in the lot    i looked up to see another, or the same, c-17, flying due west at a much    higher altitude. i pointed it out to jason and we watched as it approached    overhead when suddenly a round object moving to the north appeared to cross    the c-17s flight path at a high rate of speed. we watched this ufo for about    a minute finally losing site of it because of a building to the north.    jason, who had piloted light planes, said the object appeared round and    orange to him. we both agreed we saw something unusual, and i never saw    where the c-17 went. i tried to locate it again but could not. it too had    disappeared.
content.summary: Observed a round object fly by an air force c-17 t

content.detailedDescription: I had just gone swimming with my friends in southern wisconsin. we were going togo back to lombard, where me and my friend both live. i was going to have dinnerat her house. on our way home, it was about 510, and in late february on asaturday this year 2004 and we were around shaumburg, right before the high wayiwas looking out the vans window and a saw an octogon shaped object maybe alittle bit bigger than an aspirin. it was just a bit longer than its height, butnot by much. i dint think it was really anything until it went really, reallyfast. then it slowed down and just when i was about to loose sight of it itwould speed up again and then slow down. it continued doing this about 5 times,than it slowed down and i lost sight of it becuase it didnt speed back up again.It was a whitish color with a low bubble that just barely popped up at the top.There was a black cylinder shaped thing in the bubble. there were 5 others inthe car other than me, but i do not know if they saw it.I felt really scared when i saw it, and afterwards i was still a little afraid.Since then i have had trouble waking up in the morning and i havent been ashungry. ive lost weight would it be possuble if you could tell me what it was isaw
content.summary: Octagon shaped object with strange cylinder

content.detailedDescription: I was witness 3. i remember it just like yesterday. i am 24 now. i don't talk about it much 'cause who would believe me...But it was high in the sky on a clear day i remember. it appeared to be a black innertube shaped object. it went from one side of the horizon to the other in a couple of seconds. i'd say about 7-10 seconds. we were all together in my driveway. i remember thinking how cool it was and telling mom and dad but they just smiled and laughed. doubt they believed us. but anywho. maybe you can tell me if this was a real sighting or a weather balloon. it had no lights or any other visible charactaristics other than moving fast and it being a dark, innertube shaped object. thanks and have a great day-j. rios-huntsville,al
content.summary: Innertube shaped

content.detailedDescription: I went to a near by school field to meet my girlfriend at the time. i cannot besure of the time, but it was dark so im geussing about 22 hours it was a clearsky and we were just lying in the middle of the field staring at the stars andon occasion stop and make-out for awhile.You know how it was back then since ihad just taken astrology in science class that year i was trying to reconize thedifferent constilations. well i looked to a cornor of the sky and noticed whatseemed to be 3 stars in a perfect triangle. i immediatly pointed and saidout-loud to my girlfriend, i know that constilation and just as i said that, asif they had herd me, the 3 stars begain slowly moving across the sky, at 1sttogether, then they begain to alternate and switch around as they moved alongthe sky. about the speed of a satilite i have no idea what made me look to thatspot at that time and see that, because they looked exactly like stars. not evenan astrolager could have seen the difference. however, as they danced across thesky both me and my girlfriend stayed pretty quiet, there was the odd oh my godor holy crap but we both stayed very calm and quiet. we watched the objectsuntil the finially dissapeared into the night...I cannot remember weather theydissapeared behind the aprtments behind us, or just vanished into the night,however, i remember the night was so clear that it was very difficult to keepfixated on them because of all the stars out. afterwards we both we prettyshocked, but never really got too excited because we knew that we were probiblythe only ones who saw it and we had no proof of it, other then our memories.However, i do know it was not a plane or helicopter or balloon for the simplereasons that, they hovered and then all of the sudden begain moving. they madeabsolutly no noise, and the patterns they flew would make even an f-15 dizzy.Impossible from the decelleration and the exceleration and the foreward movementthen lateral movement they flew thanks for reading my encounter, supernaturalstuff scares the crap out of me, so i hope thats the closest i ever come to aclose encounter. sorry i could not have gotten it on tape or any hard evidence,however, there is 2 of us that saw it, so my story can be justified.
content.summary: 3 stars begain moving across the sky in formations

content.detailedDescription: 448 travelling south on i-75 from tampa fl to brandon fl at 70mph.  object wasin the air 1002b feet off the ground.  it appeared as a round object.  at first i first ithought it was a larger colored balloon.  as i neared the objects path i couldsee it was not a balloon but a disc object tumbling through the sky.  its speedwas very slow as if it was being carried along by the wind.  its altitude wasslowly rising.  as the object tumbled through the sky i could see that it wasdisc shaped and could see the leading edge and slight convex shape as it turned. i thought perhaps it was a piece of flying debris.  i decided to pull over onthe side of the road to continue to look at it stopped 12 mile north of brandonexit of i 75  the object had continued to tumble away at slow speed i wouldestimate 10 mph tumbling the entire way.  i continued to feel that it was debrisbeing carried along by the wind.  i watched the object for several minutes as ittravelled in a nw direction.   the odd thing about the object was that despiteits tumbling it did not loose altitude or speed from my point of view.  theobject made noise as it travelled no did i see any emissions smoke, exhaust etc. i stood and watched the object for several minutes as it continued to tumbleaway.  i eventually got in my car and continued.  the object was still tumblingaway and the same speed and apparantly the same altitude
content.summary: Tumbling disk

content.detailedDescription: Saw what i thought was a falling star but after observing for a few secondsrealized it was traveling horizontally too close and too fast to be a fallingstar, then it thought it was a missle of some sort but it had some type of orbor part of it went in another direction.
content.summary: Oval shaped object from west to east

content.detailedDescription: 1.  relaxing on backyard patio, enjoying stars on clear evening.  small suburbsetting.  some street lights around, but trees and shrubs around to block outsome light pollution.2.  enjoying clear starry night relaxing in lounge chair alone.  noticedsatellite.3.  satellite.4.  pleased to see satellite pass over head.  near end of observation whensatellite appeared to abruptly behave oddly - i was surprised  stunned. questioned myself if there could have been two objects, one fading out -earthshaddow heading north and another appearing at same instant heading east, butfelt that unlikely.  too much a coincidence for that.  believe i watched onlyone object during whole observation.5.  low strangeness.  faint star very high in sky elevation approx. 70-80degrees and also appeared high altitude.  only when it made an abrupt change indirection 90 degree turn heading east, did i take full notice.6.  faded quickly like disappearing suddenly into a shadow while it heading ineasterly direction.Narrative.Saw apparent satellite looked like a faint moving star moving in the normalusual fashion for a satellite moving across arc of sky night-very cleartravelingin a straight line from my vantage point from patio moving from south-east tonorth-west. i writeusual fashion - as on a summer night i might see severalsatellites pass over head during the course of several hours.  just before thisparticular satellite disappeared into earth shadow-terminator object made anabrupt-sudden 90 degree turn traveling to the east.  it traveled along this pathfor another 10 seconds or so, then faded away in night sky as if light switchedoff, or object going into earth shadow. interesting in that this satellite didnot fade out quickly after turning east, since sun sets in west.  object neverchanged appearance or size in any way.  only unusual movement noted above.  notvery strange sighting i admit from reading the above questions.  this reportdated march 15, 2004, 740 pm pacific.  event occured september 1996.  around 9pm pacific time.  i am sorry i cannot be more specific on day of month.  end.
content.summary: Odd moving satellite

content.detailedDescription: At 345 a.M. on 3-12-04, i was in my van driving west on bench blvd. on my way tomcdonalds to get my son a milkshake.  there was a half moon low in the sky andthe sky was clear.  i noticed an object in the sky exactly under the moon, andit was moving.  it could have been visable earlier and i would not have beenable to see it because the light from the moon would have washed it out.It was about the size of the planet venus, it was yellowish green in color, andit was moving.  at first i thought it was a meteor.  however, this object wasmoving slow for a meteor, it seemed to be floating to the ground rather thanfalling.I observed it for about six seconds befor i lost sight of it.  it came downdirectly under the moon from my vantage point.  to the south of my location isthe tallest hill in the area which has all of the radio antennas on it.  i lostsight of the object as the hill obstructed my view.
content.summary: Green light

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog in the vicinity of 32nd and federal in denver at 415 pm onthe afternoon of tuesday, march 9th, 2004, and was scanning the clear sky.Almost directly overhead i saw a round object that was about the size of a bbheld at arms length that was moving rapidly to the northeast. as i watched it ihad to change position to keep the object in sight, and i noticed that therewere five similar objects following the first. they were completely silent andappeared to be flying in a loose formation, and all appeared oval or ellipticalas the flew off the the northeast. i had them in sight for 25-30 seconds. asthey headed out off the objects reminded me of the 1950 great falls ufo film.The objects would have crossed the front of a light plane i saw flying due southbut i believe they were some thousand or more feet above the altitude of theplane. i also looked around and saw a helicopter to the north that appeared tobe hovering in the area of federal and i-70, which i assumed was a news chopper.At around 1645 i was again out side and looked to the north where i had seen thehelicopter and saw another strange object that hung stationary in the sky. itappeared as a black cylinder with a white streamer below it. i was able to getmy binoculars and the object appeared to be a group of orange balloons with redlights on them. the white streamer below it appeared rigid and did not move. iwatched this object for about five minutes before leaving, and when last seenthe object was ascending.
content.summary: Six disc shaped craft seen in daylight over denver

content.detailedDescription: I was at home in a small village, lewniowa. i was reading a book when my fathercalled me to the kitchen and said theres something strange outside and he wantsme to see it. i looked out and noticed 6 bright, square points being a part of abigger object only its shape was noticeable, hence it looked like a saucer. theobject was flying round an eclipse, then wobbling. my father said he saw itstopped and hovered above trees and bright white light was emitted from it,touching these trees. after ca. 10 minutes the object disappeared, but itappeared again at 23.50. behaved in the same way, and again disappeared. at24.18 it appeared above the only church in the village changing its positionfrom east to south. it was moving southeastwards, from above the church tointerior of the village ca. 400 metres track - it lasted over 30 minutes, and soon but i went to sleep. i had some problems with falling asleep and i could seethe object from my bed. i dont remember as i fell asleep, but i think ithappened suddenly. during the observation i also noticed two small, red lightsvery quickly moving in the sky, as if they were playing with themselves.
content.summary: Saw lights of an object

content.detailedDescription: Irondequoit bay sighting photoin september of 2002 ted busschaert, a 19 year old college freshman, was on theshore of irondequoit bay, just east of rochester, ny.  he was at the landing atthe bottom of the hill at the end of orchard park blvd.On the west side of thebay.  he was carrying his small 35mm automatic camera.  it was a clear day about6 pm with a layer of high clouds.  he was looking east out over the water at akid on a skidoo.  in the sky above the jet ski, ted saw a strange air objectwith unusual movements  in a head on view the object92s outline looked like the drawing below. the angular width was about  5degrees of arc, at its closest approach.  the aspect ratio of width of wing tipsto height of central dome was approximately 11 to 1. it was brown in color, seethe photo. the texture of the central dome, as seen at its closest approach wasabout 30 vertical bars side by side, stockade style.  the object appeared tocome straight head on towards ted, growing larger in size, stopping at about 45degrees of elevation over the water, then retreating straight backwards. thewidth of the bay is approximately 12 mile at the sight. this head on thenreverse motion was repeated once more. ted was surprised and took a photo.  theobject then reversed straight backwards into the clouds and disappeared.Estimating the distance to the sky object wasbc mile 1,320 ft..  trig calculations give a width of about 150 ft. and a domeheight of about 15 ft.  other friends have also claimed to have seen strangearial objects in the vicinity of the bay.
content.summary: Photo shows a brown slim profile ufo over irondequ
